name: Iron Ore
description: Iron Ore is aMineral, that allows prospectors to createTier 2/Tier 3ToolsandWeaponswith both theAnvil BenchandMachining Bench. In addition, iron is widely used inSteel Ingotfor craftingItemssuch as theSteel Pickaxe, and Late-game Deployables like theFabricator/Electric Furnace.
